alt-require.description: Alt of img must be present and alt of area[href] and input[type=image] must be set value.

attr-no-duplication.description: The same attribute can't be specified twice.

attr-sorted.description: Attributes should be sorted in an order.

attr-unsafe-chars.description: Attribute value cannot use unsafe chars.

attr-value-double-quotes.description: Attribute value must be closed by double quotes.

attr-value-no-duplication.description: Class attributes should not contain duplicate values. Other attributes can be checked via configuration.

attr-value-single-quotes.description: Attribute value must be closed by single quotes.

attr-whitespace.description: No leading or trailing spaces inside attribute values.

button-type-require.description: The type attribute of a button element must be present with a valid value: button, submit, or reset.

frame-title-require.description: A frame or iframe element must have an accessible name.

form-method-require.description: The method attribute of a form element must be present.

h1-require.description: A H1 heading element is required in HTML documents.

head-script-disabled.description: The script tag cannot be used in head.

href-abs-or-rel.description: Href must be absolute or relative.

html-lang-require.description: The lang attribute of an <html> element must be present and should be valid.

id-class-ad-disabled.description: Id and class cannot use ad keyword, it will be blocked by adblock software.

id-class-value.description: Id and class value must meet some rules: underline, dash, hump.

id-unique.description: ID attributes must be unique in the document.

link-rel-canonical-require.description: A link element with rel="canonical" is required within the <head> tag.

main-require.description: A main element is required within the <body> tag.

meta-charset-require.description: A meta charset is required within the <head> tag.

meta-description-require.description: A meta description is required within the <head> tag.

meta-viewport-require.description: A meta viewport is required within the <head> tag.

space-tab-mixed-disabled.description: Spaces and tabs cannot be mixed in front of line.

src-not-empty.description: Src of img(script,link) must set value. Empty of src will visit current page twice.

tag-no-obsolete.description: Disallows the use of obsolete HTML tags.

tag-self-close.description: The empty tag must be self-closed.

tagname-specialchars.description: Tagname must not contain any characters beside letters, numbers, ”-”, ”:” or ”_”.

tags-check.description: Check if particular tags are self-closing or must include or exclude particular tags.

title-require.description: title must be present in head tag.
